changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ${database.defaultSchemaName}.raw_records_lb SELECT r.id AS id, rr.jsonb->>'content' AS content FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.records r INNER JOIN ${database.defaultSchemaName}.raw_records rr ON (r.jsonb->>'rawRecordId')::uuid = rr.id;
